magpie.utility

Class WekaUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.utility.WekaUtility

  • public abstract class WekaUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds static methods useful for Weka-based models/clusterers.

                                                       java.lang.String[] options)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Instantiate an AbstractClassifier object from Weka.
        Parameters:
        model_type - Name of classifiers (i.e. trees.REPTree)
        options - Any options for model (can be null)
        Returns:
        A new instance of desired classifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • printImplmentingClasses

        public static java.lang.String printImplmentingClasses(java.lang.Class cls,
                                       boolean printPackage)
        Print the names and options (if applicable) of all classes that are subtypes of a certain class.
        Parameters:
        cls - Superclass of all objects of interest
        printPackage - Whether to print the package name as well
        Returns:
        List of names and options of all

      • convertToCitation

        public static Citation convertToCitation(weka.core.TechnicalInformation techInfo,
                         java.lang.Class component)
        Convert a Weka TechnicalInformation object to a Magpie Citation object.
        Parameters:
        techInfo - Technical information from Weka class
        component - Component this citation is associated with
        Returns:
        Citation object containing information from Weka technical info
